Welcome...

...to my website. Let me introduce myself a bit.

I did a lot of things and hopefully will do some more.

I like to make new things, read books, take photos... Most of all, I'm curious. For example, what happens if we don't take the established status quo for granted? I believe in quality, not quantity.

I'm writing my ideas and texts here not to try to convince anybody about my point of view. If anything here resonates with you or makes your day a bit better for a while, it's like a smile from someone on the sidewalk.

~ David
